analysis.key_quote: I urge OPM to withdraw this proposal and recommit to a truly nonpartisan, merit-based civil service that serves all Americans, regardless of which party holds the White House.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of the merit-based civil service and the potential for politicization of the federal workforce. It emphasizes the importance of due process and the integrity of civil service protections.
